title: Loch Garry Walking Route

images.title: Trevor Rickard / Loch Garry
images.caption: Loch Garry. The 'classic' viewpoint of the upper loch, taken before the area just below the roadside was planted. It will be interesting to see if they let the trees grow to obscure this wonderful viewpoint.

images.title: Sarah McGuire / Fish Farm on Loch Garry
images.caption: Fish Farm on Loch Garry

images.title: Astrid Horn, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The Loch seen from the viewpoint high above Ardochy House.

images.title: Dave Fergusson / Loch Garry from Ardochy
images.caption: Loch Garry from Ardochy. Looking towards the bridge to Torr na Carraidh.

images.title: Private road bridge over Loch Garry by John Ferguson, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Private road bridge over the loch.

description: This walk visits Loch Garry in the Scottish Highlands near Fort William. You can park in one of the lay-bys on the northern side of the loch near Ardochy House. Then follow the country lane along the large loch which is 11 km long and 50 m deep. There's also a viewpoint car park just north of Ardochy House. This is a popular spot for taking photos of the beautiful loch as from the outline of the loch has the shape of a map of Scotland.
